thread.title: North and South Korea Open First Direct Phone Line Between Leaders

author: Jonathan Cheng
title: North and South Korea Open First Direct Phone Line Between Leaders
text:
SEOULâ€”North and South Korea established for the first time a direct telephone line between their leaders, a move aimed at building trust and momentum one week before the two men are slated to meet at the inter-Korean demilitarized zone.
The presidential office in Seoul said Friday that it had successfully tested a phone connection with the personal office of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.

The... RELATED VIDEO What Could Go Wrong at a Trump-Kim Summit? A meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un could be a diplomatic breakthrough, but both men are nothing if not unpredictable.
